instructions_AddressingMessages: In this version of the simulator, you will connect to a Router instead of directly to another student. Enter an address in the "To" box to send a message to another student.
instructions_AutomaticDNS: In this version of the simulator a DNS service is provided for you. Send a message in the form GET [hostname] to the DNS service to get a student's address.
instructions_default: You have loaded NetSim in superuser mode.
instructions_SendAB: UNDER CONSTRUCTION: This version of NetSim is not yet functional. It will allow students to manually set/read individual As and Bs on a simplex wire.
instructions_SendAscii: UNDER CONSTRUCTION: This version of NetSim is not yet functional. It will allow students to send ASCII to each other.
instructions_SendBits: UNDER CONSTRUCTION: This version of NetSim is not yet functional. It will allow students to send binary as zeroes and ones to one another
instructions_ManualDNS: In this version of the simulator you can't see the other students' addresses.  Instead, one of you must act as a name service, to help share addresses with each other.
instructions_variant1: You have loaded the NetSim variant 1 template. UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Variant 1 is not yet functional because P2P connections have not been implemented.
instructions_variant2: You have loaded the NetSim variant 2 template. UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Variant 2 is not yet functional because P2P connections have not been implemented.
instructions_variant3: You have loaded the NetSim variant 3 template.
